sn24.18:1.2: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.18:1.3: ‘neva hoti, na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.18:2.1: “Rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṁ upādāya, rūpaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.18:2.2: ‘neva hoti, na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti …pe….
sn24.18:3.4: vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.18:3.5: ‘neva hoti, na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.18:3.7: “Yampidaṁ diṭṭhaṁ sutaṁ mutaṁ viññātaṁ pattaṁ pariyesitaṁ anuvicaritaṁ manasā tampi niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā”ti?
sn24.18:3.9: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn24.18:3.11: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.18:3.12: ‘neva hoti, na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.18:4.1: “Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa imesu ca ṭhānesu kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti, dukkhepissa kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti, dukkhasamudayepissa kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti, dukkhanirodhepissa kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāyapissa kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti—
sn24.18:4.2: ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti.
sn24.18:5.2: so attā no ca me siyā;
sn24.18:6.3: Anantavā ca taṁ jīvaṁ taṁ sarīranti,
sn24.18:7.3: Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti.
